channel.title: Crafting Problem
channel.description:
Simplified:
Using the Make x5 and Make x10 buttons both have the same case number when clicked on my server, can anyone help me fix this?
Explained:
When I use a needle and thread on green d'hide to make chaps/gloves/body The make x5 and make x6 options return the same result/case id meaning I cannot have a make x5 command and a make x10 command separate. Can anyone help/point me in the right direction? (Editing Menu Click return values etc.)
